attributes.action: Reduce 30p per litre diesel tax by reducing public expenditure as follows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lorrys using our roads will then use U.K. diesel not other countrys diesel.
Jails to go back to basics saving money.
Motability.Change from Hire £7.000 for 
3 years.to purchased the car for same price but to last 6 years big saving.
Water Rates in Northern Ireland to start helping the U K  economy.
Child Benefit 11age plus to be subject to 70%school attendance.
One abortion on the NHS per person
Tax Credits to be made simpler saving money on overpayment and fraud
Petrol is a old fashioned fuel we must change to diesel fuel less c o 2 better for the planet.
Inflation this will reduce to help the Bank of England.
United Kingdom will be more competative.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
